Reviews.Title: “Good friendly service.”
Reviews.Author: Shamichael
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights positive experience positives helpful friendly service fairly clean efficient housekeeping decent buffet breakfast restaurant negatives train station approx 20mins walk worse lugging luggage shower curtain water shower style hotel furnishing average ventilation overall pleasant service outweighed negatives

Reviews.Title: “great deal for family of four”
Reviews.Author: asie
Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel 2 nights family 2 adults 2 teenagers fairly 3rd floor essentially 4 single beds 2 pushed hallway entrance spacious bathroom 1 person time spectacular towel heater pleasant beautiful views neighboring church tiny tv italian channels safe fashioned radiator heaters hallways bit dingy didnt vacuumed daily breakfast sandwiches ate lunch restaurant hotel relatively cheap venice location fairly 5 minute walk rialto bridge 10 minute walk piazza san marco ca doro staff professional pleasant overall fantastically economical stay venice family compromising location quality

Reviews.Title: “Great location.”

Reviews.Content: firstly hotel location easy walk rialto bridge clean hardly suitcases imagine lot venice decor bit bathroom tiny breakfast nice cold buffet restaurant downstairs plenty choose restaurant nice service reception friendly helpful helped book trip murano island cost water bus deal bit oldish definitely stay location excellent price comparison hotels island clean

Reviews.Content: hotel privacy feels hustle bustle five minutes rialto bridge foot 15 minutes san marco square breakfasts excellent european fare dinners hotel clean didnt spend lot time suitcases wardrobe else prepared climb stairs hotel provides porters computer lobby 30 minutes 5 hotel near original home marco polo near rialto bridge catch vaporetto city water buses marked paid little access entire city study maps managers friendly attention english mediocre loved stay brava
